title: Church Fathers - Patristics (12 books) (epub, mobi)
description:
Twelve books by some of the Fathers of the Church. All are in epub and mobi formats from retail sources.


from the series Ancient Christian Writers (Paulist Press):

1. John Cassian: The Conferences (Boniface Ramsey, trans.)
2. Evagrius Ponticus: Ad Monachos (Jeremy Driscoll, trans.)
3. Origen: Homilies 1-14 on Ezekiel (Thomas P. Schreck, trans.)


from the series Works of Saint Augustine (New City Press):

4. Augustine - The Confessions (Maria Boulding, trans.)
5. Augustine - Trilogy on Faith and Happiness (Roland Teske, trans.)
---this one includes three short works:  The Happy Life, The Advantage of Believing, and Faith in the Unseen
6. Augustine - Revisions (Boniface Ramsey, trans.)
---this one is also known as the Retractations
7. Augustine - Homilies on the First Epistle of John (Boniface Ramsey, trans.)
8. Augustine - Essential Sermons (Edmund Hill, trans.)
9. Augustine - Augustine Catechism: Enchiridion on Faith Hope and Love (Bruce Harbert, trans.)


others:

10. The Rule of St Basil in Latin and English (Anna M. Silvas, trans.) Liturgical Pr.

11. Mike Aquilina, ed. - A Year With The Church Fathers: Patristic Wisdom for Daily Living. St. Benedict Press

12. Milton Walsh, ed. - Witness of the Saints: Patristic Readings in the Liturgy of the Hours. Ignatius Pr.
